name: Delta Squared
description:
Change the destiny of Delta Town!

Square Queen Shiberia has invaded the city with the Square army! They want to transform all citizens into squares, and only you can save them!

Features:

     - 4 Levels with unique bosses, plus Credits!

     - 2 Game Modes: ARCADE and INSANE, play with infinite continues or try the Insane experience!

     - Local Coop Multiplayer Mode!

     - 2 Shoot Modes: PRESS or HOLD!

     - 2 Unlockable Color Palettes!

Controls*: ActionKeyboardXbox ControllerSwitch Pro ControllerShootSpace / X / CB / A
B / AMovearrows / wasdLeft Analog / D-Pad
Left Analog / D-PadAcceptCA
ABackXB
BStartPStart / Back
+ / -

Player 2 controls with numpad or with a second controller.

*If Controller(s) not working properly, try selecting "RECONNECT CONTROLLERS" through the Options Menu from the in-game Pause Menu or maybe adding the game to Steam as Non-Steam Game, there you can remap the inputs if you want to.
